snippet.title: Rising Islands - Gameplay Teaser 2016
snippet.description:
Check out the Rising Islands Steam page: http://bit.ly/1VjWTA4

Sign up for our Newsletter: http://eepurl.com/bPuy0D

Rising Islands is a single-player adventure game in which you combine fast-paced movement with quick thinking. Jump, sprint, grind and dash through a beautiful landscape and shift between dimensions to see the world change around you.

Explore a fantastic world torn apart by an evil force. Travel through grass-covered valleys, snow-covered mountains and ancient ruins and use you powers to save the world.

Rising Islands is developed by Lone Hero Studios, an indie studio located in Sweden.
---
Find out more about Rising Islands:
Website: http://www.loneherostudios.com/rising-islands/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/risingislands/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LoneHeroStudios
Google+: https://plus.google.com/100031871043047946886
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/rising-islands
